title: Bachelorette's Tyler Cameron slams Kanye West telling Kim how to dress
text:
Tyler hit out at Kanye’s comments (Picture: Getty)

Bachelorette star Tyler Cameron has spoken out about how unimpressed he was with Kanye West’s comments that he doesn’t like Kim Kardashian dressing in revealing outfits and posting sexy photos of herself.

Kanye recently told Kim that her sexy Instagram outfits affect’ him on an episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

He told her: ‘You are my wife and it affects me when pictures are too sexy’.

Kanye didn’t like how revealing Kim’s latest Met Gala outfit was, telling her: ‘The corset, underwear, all of that vibe, I just feel like I just went through this transition where, from being a rapper, like, looking at all these girls, and looking at my wife, like, oh, my girl needs to be just like the other girls, showing her body off, showing this, showing that.

‘And I didn’t see that that was affecting, like, my soul and my spirit as someone that’s married and loved, and the father of, like, now what about to be four kids.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘A corset is like a form of underwear. It’s hot. It’s like, it’s hot for who, though?’

#KanyeWest doesn’t want #KimKardashian wearing tight clothes and taking sexy pictures pic.twitter.com/eWNK6VDwvk — THE NEIGHBORHOOD TALK (@TNHTalk) October 14, 2019

Tyler posted a clip of the episode on Twitter, writing: ‘What not to do. You should want your significant other to be sexy and feel sexy.

‘Ye lost his confidence. Fellas if you can’t stand the heat get out the kitchen. Encourage your significant other to be all they can be. Not hold them back.’

Kim had also opened up about how insecure the comments had made her feel, telling Kanye on the show: ‘You knew last night I was having really bad anxiety, and I don’t need any more negative energy for you to now say that you’re not into me wearing a tight dress.

‘You built me up to be, like, this sexy person and confident and all this stuff. And just because you’re on a journey, and you’re on your transformation doesn’t mean that I’m in the same spot with you.’

description: Tyler Cameron isn't here for Kanye West telling Kim Kardashian not to dress so sexy, saying he's 'lost confidence'.
